description:

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- loansLogic = _vLogic (contracts/RHCertificatesFactory.sol#54)

description:
Reentrancy in RHCertificatesFactory.createCertificate(string,string,address,address,uint8,uint8,uint8) (contracts/RHCertificatesFactory.sol#68-84):
	External calls:
	- proxy = new BeaconProxy(address(loansBeacon),abi.encodeWithSelector(RHCertificateToken(address(address(0))).initialize.selector,address(this),_tokenName,_tokenSymbol,_admin,_paymentToken,_decs,_riskDegree,_certificateType)) (contracts/RHCertificatesFactory.sol#76-77)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- certificatesCounter ++ (contracts/RHCertificatesFactory.sol#81)
	- deployedCertificates.push(address(proxy)) (contracts/RHCertificatesFactory.sol#78)
	- isCertificateDeployed[address(proxy)] = true (contracts/RHCertificatesFactory.sol#79)

description:
RHCertificateToken.setTokenExpired() (contracts/RHCertificateToken.sol#203-210) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= maturityDate (contracts/RHCertificateToken.sol#204)
markdown:
[RHCertificateToken.setTokenExpired()](contracts/RHCertificateToken.sol#L203-L210) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [block.timestamp >= maturityDate](contracts/RHCertificateToken.sol#L204)
